item.description:
HOT TUB AND POOL PARTY at Joanne's house in Natick
Bring your bathing suit/towel/sunscreen
This will start at 2pm till................
Directions will be sent to those attending
Please let me know what you will be bringing drinks/snacks ect....
THANKS JOANNE
***** There will be people that are not from our group there*****
